snippet.title: Meet a Higgs boson -- 'God particle' -- detective
snippet.description:
* One trillionth of a second after the Big Bang is the timeframe that physicist Joe Incandela knows well. So he was surprised by an invitation to speak to businesspeople last year about predictions for 2013.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/14/tech/innovation/lhc-higgs-boson-incandela/index.html

snippet.title: World's largest particle accelerator offers window into laws of nature
snippet.description:
* Geneva may have given the world precision watches, but its biggest contribution to humanity is a giant time machine.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/TECH/innovation/05/11/motherboard.hadron.collider/index.html

snippet.title: Inside CERN's $10 billion collider
snippet.description:
* The biggest hazard for anyone lucky enough to see CMS, one of the major detector experiments deep underground at the Large Hadron Collider, is tripping.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/08/tech/innovation/lhc-cern-higgs-cms/index.html
